body.p: The IASB was informed that changes to financial assets or financial liabilities arising from the reform could be made in different ways. Specifically, entities may change the basis for determining the contractual cash flows of a financial instrument by:

li.p: amending the contractual terms of a financial asset or a financial liability to replace the referenced interest rate benchmark with an alternative benchmark rate;
altering the method for calculating the interest rate benchmark without amending the contractual terms of the financial instrument; and/or
triggering the activation of an existing contractual term such as a fallback clause.
